item.title: The story of trust destroyed | JNUC 2020
item.description: The truth about MDM Migration: Journey through time as Jamf consulting engineers Mischa van der Bent and Rob Potvin talk about the current design of the Apple MDM protocol and what the migration process looks like for moving existing devices from one MDM to another. This can be fairly difficult, but success is possible with a bit of time, effort and planning. It is not really migrating, but destroying trust.

item.title: Off-boarding in a Modern Deployment | JNUC 2019
item.description: Imaging is dead. Secure Boot and the T2 system controller have changed the toolset available to Mac administrators. The new post-imaging world of Mojave requires new workflows.
